headline: Top Dividend Stocks To Consider In August 2025
summary: As the U.S. stock market continues its rally, with major indices like the S&P 500 and Nasdaq hitting new all-time highs, investors are paying close attention to dividend stocks as a potential source of steady income amidst fluctuating interest rates. In this environment, selecting strong dividend stocks often involves looking for companies with stable earnings and a history of consistent payouts, which can provide a cushion against market volatility.

headline: U.S. Bank M&A Activity Rises To 4-Year High In July
summary: With the recent upswing of deal announcements, bank executives suggested this may be the signal of a much-anticipated wave of US bank M&A. Read more here.
